name: [Ends of the Earth] Test-Mock
tagline: Going to the [Ends of the Earth] for the best.
body:
### Welcome to the [Ends of the Earth]
This page serves as my soft launch site for the Addiction-test site. I'll be updating it as I build it, as well as posting my future changes.

### How to view the site:
## *[ Direct Link to functioning Desktop site ](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/nullality/AddictionTest/blob/master/index.html)

## *[ Direct Link to functioning Tablet site ](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/nullality/AddictionTest/blob/master/tablet/index.html)

### This site is/features: 
* Fixed page
* Single continuous page 
* Navigation menu. 
* Dynamic - On Desktop the navigation floats, on mobile it doesn't. 
* Feel free to reach out with any questions. 

### How it was made
I took the PDF and used it as inspiration, using Adobe Muse and quickly crafted a fixed width page layout, and began creating images to source.

Final product could be completely responsive, or it could be dynamic (changing depending on screen resolution).

Custom, or Stock imagery would be added later, as well I would embed the font we use, so that the site contains less images and runs faster.

### Contact:
Brandon Miguelez
ArtxNullality@Gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
